 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאַב‎</span>] **verb** ==draw== (water) (Late Hebrew ***id.***, also ***attract***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁאֵיב‎</span>, of magnet; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be satisfied with drinking***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּשְׁאַבְתֶּם‎</span> [[Isa.12.3|Isa 12:3]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַּתִּשְׁאַב‎</span> [[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָ֑ב‎</span>- v[[Gen.24.45|Gen 24:45]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁאָ֑ב‎</span> v[[Gen.24.19|Gen 24:19]] v[[Gen.24.44|Gen 24:44]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁאֲבוּן‎</span> [[Ruth.2.9|Ruth 2:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁאֲבוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.7.6|1Sam 7:6]] + 2 t.; ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁאֲבִי‎</span> [[Nah.3.14|Nah 3:14]] ***Participle*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁאֵב‎</span> [[Deut.29.10|Deut 29:10]], plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁאֲבֵי‎</span> [[Josh.9.21|Josh 9:21]]; [[Josh.9.23|Josh 9:23]]; [[Josh.9.27|Josh 9:27]] feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֹּׁאֲבֹת‎</span> [[Gen.24.11|Gen 24:11]] — ***draw*** water, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span> [[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.7.6|1Sam 7:6]]; [[1Sam.9.11|1Sam 9:11]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of source [[2Sam.23.16|2Sam 23:16]] = [[1Chr.11.18|1Chr 11:18]]; [[Isa.12.3|Isa 12:3]] (figurative); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָךְ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מָצוֺר שׁ‎</span> [[Nah.3.14|Nah 3:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span> omitted [[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]]; [[Gen.24.43|Gen 24:43]]; [[Gen.24.45|Gen 24:45]] and (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of animals) v[[Gen.24.19|Gen 24:19]] v[[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]] v[[Gen.24.44|Gen 24:44]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]); with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר‎</span> [[Ruth.2.9|Ruth 2:9]] drink of ***that which*** the young men ***drew***; Participle feminine plural [[Gen.24.11|Gen 24:11]] ***the water-drawing women***; masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁאֵב מֵימֶיךָ‎</span> [[Deut.29.10|Deut 29:10]] (servile labour, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹטֵב עֵצֶיּךָ‎</span>), so masculine plural [[Josh.9.21|Josh 9:21]]; [[Josh.9.23|Josh 9:23]]; [[Josh.9.27|Josh 9:27]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; all with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>, and all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹטְבֵי עֵצִים‎</span>).
